meanings.sent1: She walked tiredly to the bus stop.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, he yawned tiredly.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed tiredly after playing all day.
meanings.sent4: The old car sputtered tiredly up the hill.
meanings.sent5: The wind blew tiredly through the trees, rustling the leaves.

meanings.definition: Feeling or showing the effects of fatigue.
meanings.sent1: The tiredly student struggled to stay awake in class.
meanings.sent2: She had a tiredly expression after working overtime.
meanings.sent3: The tiredly puppy flopped down for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The tiredly engine sputtered to a stop.
meanings.sent5: The tiredly sky darkened as the sun set.
